dc.title: OAS Home: Alcohol, tobacco & drug abuse and mental health data from SAMHSA, Office of Applied Studies
dc.description: national and State alcohol, tobacco, and illegal drug abuse statistics from SAMHSA's national surveys of alcohol, tobacco, drug use and mental health; substance abuse treatment facilities; and drug related emergency room departments: Substance Abuse & Mental Health Services Administration(SAMHSA).
dc.subject: drugs; abuse; substance abuse; alcohol; SAMHSA; SAMSHA; mental health
